song.title: One Thing
song.lyrics:
[v] .D2 Asus7 D2 Asus7 Single minded, whole hearted, one thing I ask
[p] . Em7 G D Asus That I may gaze upon Your beauty Oh Lord . Em7 G D Asus That I may seek Your Holy Face . Em7 G D Asus That I may know You in an intimate way . Bm7 A2 Em7 And follow after You all of my days
[c] . D A2 All of life comes down to just one thing . Bm7 G And that's to know You oh Jesus and make You known
song.author: Charlie Hall
